00051 static EGS_SimpleApplication  *egsApp = 0;
00052 
00053 void _null_terminate(char *s, int len) {
00054     int j;
00055     for(j=len-1; j>=0; j--) {
00056         if( !isspace(s[j]) ) { if( j < len-1 ) s[j+1] = 0; break; }
00057     }
00058     if( j < 0 ) s[0] = 0;
00059 }

00062 const char fs = 92;
00063 #else
00064 const char fs = '/';
00065 #endif

00102 
00103 EGS_SimpleApplication::EGS_SimpleApplication(int argc, char **argv) {
00104 
00105     g = 0; source = 0; rndm = 0; input = 0;
00106 
00107     //
00108     // *** make sure that there is only a single application.
00109     //
00110     if( egsApp ) egsFatal("There can only be a single EGS_SimpleApplication"
00111             " in a program\n");
00112     egsApp = this; ncase = 0;
00113 
00114     //
00115     // *** set the number of histories to run
00116     //
00117     for(int i=0; i<argc-1; i++) {
00118         if( !strcmp("-n",argv[i]) || !strcmp("--ncase",argv[i]) ) {
00119             ncase = atoi(argv[i+1]); break;
00120         }
00121     }
00122     if( ncase < 1 ) ncase = 1000;
00123 
00124     //
00125     // *** init the EGS system
00126     //
00127     egsInit(argc,argv);
00128 
00129     //
00130     // *** null terminate directory and file names just in case
00131     //
00132     _null_terminate(the_egsio->user_code,64);
00133     _null_terminate(the_egsio->input_file,256);
00134     _null_terminate(the_egsio->output_file,256);
00135     _null_terminate(the_egsio->egs_home,128);
00136     _null_terminate(the_egsio->hen_house,128);
00137     _null_terminate(the_egsio->pegs_file,256);
00138     _null_terminate(the_egsio->work_dir,128);
00139 
00140     //
00141     // ********** Get the content of the input file.
00142     //
00143     string ifile(the_egsio->egs_home); ifile += the_egsio->user_code;
00144     ifile += fs; ifile += the_egsio->input_file;
00145     ifile += ".egsinp";
00146     input = new EGS_Input; input->setContentFromFile(ifile.c_str());
00147 
00148     //
00149     // ********** Construct a simulation geometry from the input
00150     //
00151     EGS_Input *geom_input = input->takeInputItem("geometry definition");
00152     if( !geom_input ) egsFatal("No geometry definition in the input file\n");
00153     g = EGS_BaseGeometry::createGeometry(geom_input);
00154     if( !g ) egsFatal("Failed to construct the simulation geometry\n");
00155     delete geom_input;
00156     EGS_BaseGeometry::describeGeometries();
00157     egsInformation("\nThe simulation geometry is of type %s and has the "
00158             "name '%s'\n\n",g->getType().c_str(),g->getName().c_str());
00159 
00160     //
00161     // *********** Add the media names present in the geometry
00162     //
00163     for(int j=0; j<g->nMedia(); j++) {
00164         const char *medname = g->getMediumName(j);
00165         int len = strlen(medname);
00166         int ind = egsAddMedium(medname, len);
00167         if( ind != j+1 ) egsFatal("Medium index mismatch: %d %d\n",ind,j+1);
00168     }
00169 
00170     //
00171     // ********** Construct a particle source from the input
00172     //
00173     EGS_Input *source_input = input->takeInputItem("source definition");
00174     if( !source_input ) egsFatal("No source definition in the input file\n");
00175     source = EGS_BaseSource::createSource(source_input);
00176     if( !source ) egsFatal("Failed to construct the particle source\n");
00177     delete source_input;
00178 
00179     //
00180     // ********* Construct a random number generator from the input
00181     //
00182     rndm = EGS_RandomGenerator::createRNG(input,the_egsio->i_parallel);
00183     if( !rndm ) rndm = EGS_RandomGenerator::defaultRNG(the_egsio->i_parallel);
00184 
00185     //
00186     // ********** Get transport parameter settings from the input file
00187     //
00188     int ounit = 6;
00189     egsGetTransportParameter(&ounit);
00190 
00191     //
00192     // *********** Get the cross section data
00193     //
00194     egsHatch();
00195 
00196     //
00197     // *********** Set ecut_new and pcut_new
00198     //
00199     the_bounds->ecut_new = the_bounds->ecut;
00200     the_bounds->pcut_new = the_bounds->pcut;
00201 
00202     //
00203     // ********** Now check if the cross section data covers the energy
00204     //            range needed by the source
00205     //
00206     EGS_Float Emax = source->getEmax(); bool is_ok = true;
00207     for(int imed=0; imed<g->nMedia(); imed++) {
00208         if( Emax > the_thresh->up[imed] ||
00209             Emax > the_thresh->ue[imed] - the_useful->rm ) {
00210             egsWarning("The maximum energy of the source (%g) is higher than\n"
00211                 "  the cross section data energy range for medium %d\n",
00212                 Emax,imed+1);
00213             is_ok = false;
00214         }
00215     }
00216     if( !is_ok ) egsFatal("Create new PEGS data sets and retry\n");
00217 
00218     nreport = 10;
00219 
00220 }
00221 
00222 EGS_SimpleApplication::~EGS_SimpleApplication() {
00223     if( g ) {
00224         if( g->deref() ) delete g;
00225     }
00226     if( source ) delete source;
00227     if( rndm ) delete rndm; if( input ) delete input;
00228 }
00229 
00230 void EGS_SimpleApplication::finish() {
00231     egsFinish();
00232 }
00233 
00234 int EGS_SimpleApplication::run() {
00235 
00236     egsInformation("\n\nSimulating %d particles...\n\n",ncase);
00237     EGS_Timer timer; timer.start();
00238     EGS_I64 nperb = ncase/nreport; if( nperb < 1 ) nperb = 1;
00239     EGS_Float aperb = ((EGS_Float)nperb)/((EGS_Float)ncase);
00240     int q, latch; EGS_Float E, wt; EGS_Vector x,u;
00241     sum_E = 0; sum_E2 = 0; Etot = 0; sum_w = 0; sum_w2 = 0;
00242     for(EGS_I64 icase=1; icase<=ncase; icase++) {
00243         if( icase%nperb == 0 ) egsInformation("+Finished %7.2f percent of"
00244                " cases, cpu time = %9.3f\n",
00245                100*aperb*(icase/nperb),timer.time());
00246         EGS_I64 this_case = source->getNextParticle(rndm,q,latch,E,wt,x,u);
00247         //egsInformation("Got %d %g %g (%g,%g,%g) (%g,%g,%g) %lld\n",
00248         //      q,E,wt,x.x,x.y,x.z,u.x,u.y,u.z,this_case);
00249         sum_E += E*wt; sum_E2 += wt*E*E; sum_w += wt; sum_w2 += wt*wt;
00250         int ireg = g->isWhere(x);
00251         if( ireg < 0 ) {
00252             EGS_Float t = 1e30; ireg = g->howfar(ireg,x,u,t);
00253             if( ireg >= 0 ) x += u*t;
00254         }
00255         if( ireg >= 0 ) {
00256             //egsInformation(" entering in region %d\n",ireg);
00257             last_case = this_case;
00258             if( q == 1 ) Etot += (E + 2*the_useful->rm)*wt; else Etot += E*wt;
00259             the_stack->E[0] = (q) ? E + the_useful->rm : E;
00260             the_stack->x[0] = x.x; the_stack->y[0] = x.y; the_stack->z[0] = x.z;
00261             the_stack->u[0] = u.x; the_stack->v[0] = u.y; the_stack->w[0] = u.z;
00262             the_stack->dnear[0] = 0; the_stack->wt[0] = wt;
00263             the_stack->ir[0] = ireg+2; the_stack->iq[0] = q;
00264             the_stack->latch[0] = latch; the_stack->np = 1;
00265             startHistory(this_case);
00266             egsShower();
00267             endHistory();
00268         }
00269     }
00270     egsInformation("\n\nFinished simulation, CPU time was %g\n\n",
00271             timer.time());
00272     sum_E = sum_E/sum_w; sum_E2 = sum_E2/sum_w; sum_E2 -= sum_E*sum_E;
00273     if( sum_E2 > 0 ) sum_E2 = sqrt(sum_E2/(sum_w*sum_w/sum_w2-1));
00274     egsInformation("Average particle energy: %g +/- %g\n\n",sum_E,sum_E2);
00275 
00276     return 0;
00277 
00278 }
00279 
00280 void EGS_SimpleApplication::fillRandomArray(int n, EGS_Float *rarray) {
00281     rndm->fillArray(n,rarray);
00282 }
00283 
00284 extern __extc__ void egsHowfar() {
00285     int np = the_stack->np-1; int ireg = the_stack->ir[np]-2;
00286     if( ireg < 0 ) { the_epcont->idisc = 1; return; }
00287     int newmed;
00288     int inew = egsApp->howfar(ireg,
00289             EGS_Vector(the_stack->x[np],the_stack->y[np],the_stack->z[np]),
00290             EGS_Vector(the_stack->u[np],the_stack->v[np],the_stack->w[np]),
00291             the_epcont->ustep,&newmed);
00292     if( inew != ireg ) {
00293         the_epcont->irnew = inew+2; the_useful->medium_new = newmed+1;
00294         if( inew < 0 ) {
00295             the_epcont->idisc = -1; // i.e. discard after the step.
00296             the_useful->medium_new = 0;
00297         }
00298     }
00299 }
00300 
00301 extern __extc__ void egsAusgab(EGS_I32 *iarg) {
00302     egsApp->ausgab(*iarg);
00303 }
00304 
00305 extern __extc__ void egsHownear(EGS_Float *tperp) {
00306     int np = the_stack->np-1; int ireg = the_stack->ir[np]-2;
00307     *tperp = egsApp->hownear(ireg,EGS_Vector(the_stack->x[np],the_stack->y[np],
00308                 the_stack->z[np]));
00309 }
00310 
00311 extern __extc__ void egsStartParticle() {
00312     int np = the_stack->np - 1; int ir = the_stack->ir[np]-2;
00313     the_useful->medium = egsApp->getMedium(ir)+1; the_epcont->idisc = 0;
00314 }
00315 
00316 extern __extc__ void egsFillRandomArray(const EGS_I32 *n, EGS_Float *rarray) {
00317     egsApp->fillRandomArray(*n,rarray);
00318 }
